snippet.title: Shadows of Doubt: August 2019 Pre-Alpha Gameplay
snippet.description:
20 Minutes of gameplay footage from my upcoming stealth detective game 'Shadows of Doubt'.

A first-person detective stealth game set in a fully-simulated neo-noir city! There’s a serial killer on the loose, and it’s up to you to catch them by any means necessary: Sneak, tail, hide, hack and lock-pick. Just keep a low profile!

If this looks like your thing, please wishlist us on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/986130/Shadows_of_Doubt/
For more visit http://shadows.game

Sites
Official website: http://shadows.game/
Company website: https://colepowered.com/
